entry.content:

entry.title: Game: Battletoads & Double Dragon (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Battletoads & Double Dragon (SNES, 1993)20131208
I played this for about five minutes and beat the first stage and
got to Adobo. The game feels really stiff. The stun-lock that you
can get is really aggravating. It feels like it was designed to
have really long animations that look cool, rather than actually
play well.

Total time: 0:05
  • Video Games
  • Battletoads & Double Dragon
  • SNES
  • 1993

entry.title: Game: Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shōgun Magginesu (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shōgun Magginesu (SNES, 1993)20131208
Something about this game was causing my setup to blank out
repeatedly. It was very annoying and I couldn't take it, so I
turned it off. I managed to get through the first level and it
seemed a lot like the first game, but when I got to the World Map,
it seemed nice to have a clearer path.

Total time: 0:03
  • Video Games
  • Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shōgun Magginesu
  • SNES
  • 1993

entry.title: Game: Romancing SaGa 2 (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Romancing SaGa 2 (SNES, 1993)20131208
This game looked great, like FF6, but is way too Japanese for my
level of understanding... not to mention that it is a SaGa game
and they're super complicated anyways.

entry.title: Game: Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (SNES, 1993)20131208
This was a very dumb game. I can tell that the graphics would have
been considered beautiful at the time, but it played very poorly
and boringly.

Total time: 0:05

entry.title: Game: Tetris Battle Gaiden (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Tetris Battle Gaiden (SNES, 1993)20131208
I played this for about fifteen minutes. It felt like a good
rendition of Tetris. I found the AI really hard and it really
painful to play Tetris well while fighting the opponent. My first
match against Halloween I didn't know how to launch attacks. I
think I will put this in my stack of good "Vs" games.

Total time: 0:15
  • Video Games
  • Tetris Battle Gaiden
  • SNES
  • 1993

entry.title: Game: Torneko's Great Adventure: Mysterious Dungeon (SNES, 1993)
entry.content:
Game: Torneko's Great Adventure: Mysterious Dungeon (SNES, 1993)20131208
I played this for about twenty minutes. I got the Jewel Chest from
the Trial Dungeon and was on my way out at Level 5 when I was
killed by a Mummy. It stunk. This is very similar to Shiren the
Wanderer. I like it.

Total time: 0:23

  • Torneko's Great Adventure: Mysterious Dungeon
  • SNES

entry.title: Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Shores of the Cosmic Ocean
entry.content:
Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Shores of the Cosmic Ocean20131207
This was a very fun episode. I love the immensity of space and
Sagan does a great job getting it across in the episode.
  • TV Shows
  • Cosmos: A Personal Voyage

entry.title: Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 2 - One Voice in the Cosmic Fugue
entry.content:
Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 2 - One Voice in the Cosmic Fugue20131207
This was a nice introduction to evolution. I thought the Heike
crab and life on Jupiter parts were great.

entry.title: Movie: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire, starring Jennifer Lawrence (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire, starring Jennifer Lawrence (2013)20131207
We saw this in the theatres. I enjoyed it a lot. I thought the
acting was great and it brought across the highs and lows of the
book. I like the epicness of the story, so it was fun to see it on
the big screen.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 2 (US) (SNES, 1993) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 2 (US) (SNES, 1993) (3)20131206
I played today for about fifteen minutes and went back and forth
on 3-1 and 3-2. I was soooo annoyed by the game. I kept getting
killed by dead Birdos, the Throw button wasn't working, you can't
duck under Birdo eggs or other projectiles, urgh. I was so
annoyed. I wonder if it's just the All-Stars version that is
bugging me?

Total time: 1:51
  • Video Games
  • Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 2 (US)
  • SNES
  • 1993

entry.title: Movie: Waco: The Rules of Engagment, directed by William Gazecki (1997)
entry.content:
Movie: Waco: The Rules of Engagment, directed by William Gazecki (1997)20131206
This was a very sad movie that made me disgusted with the
government. It was so reminiscent of the attacks on *REDACTED*s. I
can't believe that similar persecution happened to the *REDACTED*s in
Texas recently.
  • Movies
  • 1997

entry.title: Movie: Jab We Met, starring Kareena Kapoor (2007)
entry.content:
Movie: Jab We Met, starring Kareena Kapoor (2007)20131205
This was a super cute Bollywood movie. A lot of the effects were
insanely bad and really unnecessary. The story was a tiny bit of a
surprise and had lots of cute moments. I thought the ending was
really bizarre because there was no wedding.
  • Movies
  • 2007

entry.title: Movie: 2 Guns, starring Mark Wahlberg (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: 2 Guns, starring Mark Wahlberg (2013)20131205
This was a really fun crime/action movie. I like that everyone is
against everyone else. It's very reminiscent of The Departed. I
thought that Bill Paxton was really great in it. It's fun the way
they become a CIA fighting team at the end. It's a crazy statement
on the world that the CIA can be such a believable "bad guy" group
in a movie.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 3 (SNES, 1993) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 3 (SNES, 1993) (3)20131204
I played today for about two hours and beat all of World 8. I
skipped 8-1 after a lot of attempts and then had a struggle on
Castle Koopa. Eventually I thought it would be funny to see if a
P-Wing would be helpful, since I had banked so many of them. It
was super easy with a P-Wing. It didn't help much with Bowser,
because you have to touch the pit for him to go at you, but I
still beat him. Boom.

Total time: 6:11
  • Video Games
  • Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 3
  • SNES
  • 1993

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 3 (SNES, 1993) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 3 (SNES, 1993) (2)20131203

entry.title: Movie: Days of Thunder, starring Tom Cruise (1990)
entry.content:
Movie: Days of Thunder, starring Tom Cruise (1990)20131202
This was a fun and heart-warming early 90s movie. Tom Cruise was in
good shape. I remember seeing this movie when I was younger, but
not well enough to have realized that Ricky Bobby was mainly a
parody of this movie.
  • Movies
  • 1990

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 2 (JP) (SNES, 1993) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Super Mario All-Stars: Super Mario Bros. 2 (JP) (SNES, 1993) (3)20131201
This morning I played up to 7-4 in about an hour. All the World 7
levels were really tough. It was the worst on 7-1 and 7-2 because
I died within view of the flagpole and had to work my way back
painfully. 7-3 was a crazy level with the trampolines.

Total time: 4:29
